summary: A true light dragon armor.  Remember what it lacks in deflection it makes up for in distraction. =)
descriptionHtml:
New in 2.0 -  Fixed the floating underwear underneath the skirt and a few clipping issues as well as removing the waist plates from the scale skirt.  The floating underwear shared position in the texture file with the back of the skirt so I had to edit it in blender.  If you come across any issues let me know.  Before this week I have never used Nifskope or Blender.

This is an edit of the Dragonscale light armor for female characters only.  I felt that the stock armor was more of a Heavy armor style than a light armor. This removes quite a bit of the excess dragonbone on the armor giving it a much lighter feel and resembles a dragonscale/dragonbone corset as opposed to a suit of plate mail. I\'ve managed to tweak the mesh placement to avoid almost all of the clipping.  While testing it out the only times I can see it are in the basic power attack animation.

Thanks to the posts done by Templar666 and Thepal I figured out how to make this and got the resources to do so.  Much kudos to them and there hard work.   The screenshots don\'t include Thepals texture files to avoid angering any powers that might be.  Also this is my first mod ever.  Hope you enjoy.

I should probably add that I\'ve only tested this on my female character and not a slew of body shapes and races so let me know if you catch any snags.
author: Dbard
